content: +description this is a crochet pattern for the lovelace top an airy summer top that will pair perfectly with all your favorite outfits it is made up of simple double_crochet and chain stitches to create a unique lacy texture from the beach to a night out on the town to your everyday wear this top is truly something that you need in your wardrobe +what you will get an eight page color coded pdf written in standard us terms which includes photo tutorials for every step of the pattern this pattern includes instructions for sizes xsmall - 5xl +skill level this is a beginner level pattern +materials *approximately 650-1275 yards of category 3 light weight yarn depending on size *size k 6 5 mm crochet hook *yarn needle +more check out more of cactus and lace designs patterns here https //www etsy com/shop/cactusandlacedesigns if you have any questions or difficulties with this pattern at all please don t hesitate to message me i would love to help answer any of your questions +share your work don t forget to follow along on social media to receive updates and to share your work instagram @cactus and lace ravelry ravelry com/people/cactusandlacedesigns pinterest https //www pinterest com/cactusandlacedesigns/ please tag me @cactus and lace in your pictures of your finished items i would love to see and share them and don t forget to use the hashtag #cactusandlacedesigns +pattern copyright please do not copy redistribute or sell my pattern in any way i hope you enjoy your finished lovelace top if you choose to sell the finished product please credit me ashley cobb of cactus & lace designs and provide a link to www etsy com/shop/cactusandlacedesigns in your listings so that other makers can find me as well thank you for understanding ****all downloadable pdf patterns are non-refundable****
